Events that occurred on 24 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 63.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 196a.
1962 - Author and editor Henry Gee is born.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar is released.
2008 - Guillermo del Toro is officially announced as the director of The Hobbit film adaptation and its proposed sequel.
2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Doom of the Last-King" is released in North America.
2014 - Peter Jackson announces that the third Hobbit film is to be renamed from There and Back Again to The Battle of the Five Armies.
2018 - Robert Murray dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content: There are no known events for this day.
